# Engine Condition Trend Monitoring for Aircraft Engines.

# Dependencies

1.	Python 3.x 
2.	Numpy, Scipy, Pandas, Matplotlib 
3.	TensorFlow 1.x+, Keras 2.x+
4.  NVIDIA CUDA 9.x, cuDNN 7.x (Only if using Tensorflow-GPU)
5.	Sci-kit learn

# Important Files and Folders

```
ectm
│   README.md   
│
└───data
│   
└───code

```
